org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.asyncfs

Class WrapperAsyncFSOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.asyncfs.WrapperAsyncFSOutput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, AsyncFSOutput

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class WrapperAsyncFSOutput
extends Object
implements AsyncFSOutput
    An AsyncFSOutput wraps a FSDataOutputStream.
